description: GILMAR sells detached villa in the best area of Valdetorres del Jarama in impeccable condition. The house of 400 m2 is distributed over 3 floors and is located on a plot of 500 m2. The property stands out for its south orientation, which guarantees an abundant entry of natural light throughout the day. On the main floor, from the entrance hall, there is access to a spacious living room with fireplace, kitchen with dining area, 2 bedrooms both with fitted closets and a bathroom. The second floor has 3 bedrooms. The master bedroom with dressing room and bathroom en suite. There is also another bathroom. The basement has an open plan room with fireplace and two separate environments, perfect for creating a space for meetings with friends or games room. It also has a bathroom, utility room and a closed garage for two cars. The villa stands out for its interior wood carpentry and exterior carpentry Climalit. Valdetorres del Jarama is a municipality located north of Madrid and gives you the opportunity to live in a very appreciated environment in a privileged natural area but with all the comforts and services of living in a town of 5,000 inhabitants: School, supermarket, health center, pharmacy, restaurants, church, workshop, 2 nurseries, hairdresser, local police, firefighters, sports areas, municipal swimming pool, paddle and tennis courts, children's play areas, clean point service, garbage collection, etc.  Only 20 minutes from Madrid by the A-1 and with inter-city bus lines that arrive at Plaza Castilla on a regular schedule every 25 minutes.

The municipality has numerous services such as schools, nurseries, health center, pharmacies, restaurants, veterinarian, own town hall, post office, supermarkets, etc. We are a team of professionals! •With more than 15 years of experience in the sector, which will accompany you throughout the process of buying your home: • Accompany you to see the properties that fit your wishes. • Advise you legally, fiscally and financially to verify the charges that the property may have, the costs of expenses and taxes and how to finance it. • We manage your credit or mortgage. • We draft the sales contracts and inform you of the necessary documentation. •Finally, once the property is purchased, we provide you with the local suppliers that are necessary for you so that you can leave your property as you dreamed of. description: ALTAZAGA REAL ESTATE Don't miss the opportunity to acquire this beautiful semi-detached house for sale! With an excellent location, this property is located in a quiet area surrounded by green areas, perfect for enjoying nature without leaving the city. The house has a private and paved garden on both sides of the property, with an iron pergola and awnings to celebrate family gatherings outdoors. In addition, the south orientation at the entrance and hallway allows natural light to enter all the rooms on the main floor. On the main floor is the kitchen, with the possibility of joining it to the living room, which has direct access to the private garden and terrace with views. We also find a modern toilet with an exterior window and the same orientation. On the first floor are the bedrooms, one of them with a bay window and a renovated en-suite bathroom with a shower and bay window. The rooms are separate from the main one, one of them with a terrace and views of the Madrid mountains and a renovated bathroom with a jacuzzi bathtub. On the second floor we find a 30 m2 attic with Vélux windows, ideal as a games room or office for teleworking. The garage is also accessed from inside the house, with capacity for 2 vehicles and storage, and a boiler room and independent oil heating in the same area of the garage. In addition, the property has access to a community area of neighbors. Don't miss the opportunity to acquire your dream home in a privileged location! We have a financial department to help you get the best mortgage on the market.

Valdetorres de Jarama is a municipality in the Community of Madrid.Its area is 33.5 km² and it is located 32 kilometers from Alcalá and 39 kilometers from Madrid.The way of life in Valdetorres de Jarama, as well as in most of the towns in the middle course of the Jarama and Henares, was marked by the predominance of agriculture and livestock, mainly sheep, for this reason, festivals and traditions were intimately linked to the predominance of these activities, especially to the development of the agricultural calendar. Sociodemographics Inhabitants: 4,260Number of households: 2,240Average age of people: 38 years% foreigners: 16%Average level of education: Secondary.
